short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically pauses Spotify when YouTube is playing and vice versa!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Still pausing and unpausing your YouTube video and Spotify music manually? 

Well the struggle is now over with Spotify YouTube Controller!

This extension will automatically pause your music in Spotify when your YouTube video is playing and vice versa! Click on the extension to turn it OFF or ON or visit the Settings page to create a hotkey shortcut for this action!
